about_the_game:
Hanami Live Wallpaper features four black kittens and a special sakura period during the springtime! Complemented with crafted animations and real-time dynamic parallax effect.

p.s.
After 'live wallpaper' installation within Kiku Wallpaper Launcher click on 'Refresh' button (middle bottom) or simply restart launcher to make sure new 'live wallpaper' appears on the list!
detailed_description:
Hanami Live Wallpaper features four black kittens and a special sakura period during the springtime! Complemented with crafted animations and real-time dynamic parallax effect.

p.s.
After 'live wallpaper' installation within Kiku Wallpaper Launcher click on 'Refresh' button (middle bottom) or simply restart launcher to make sure new 'live wallpaper' appears on the list!

pc_requirements.minimum:
